title: Party Systems in Russia and China

content.prompt: Which of the following is an accurate comparison of the current political party systems in Russia and China?

choices.label: China has a two-party system, while Russia has a dominant-party system.
China has a one-party system, while Russia has a dominant-party system.
China has a multiparty system, while Russia has a one-party system.
China has a dominant-party system, while Russia has a one-party system.

unit.text: 4: Party and Electoral Systems and Citizen Organizations

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Compare two or more course countries based on their political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
